ygData.subject: Re: Great Bloodsaber faction (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I spent levels 14-19 in mainly Befallen and High Pass, and one of the finest days in my SK career was the first time I could sell.  I m all for being evil,
ygData.messageBody:
"Grant, Joseph" wrote:
>
> From: "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...>
>
> Hhehe, that sounds great!
>
> Didn't those newbies realise you were evil? Ah well, now I just need to do
> the long trek through Rathe and Karanas as I'm still KOS in High Hold.
>

I spent levels 14-19 in mainly Befallen and High Pass, and one of
the finest days in my SK career was the first time I could sell. I'm
all for being evil, but I think the citizens of Highpass are better
used thinking I'm a friend =) I can't stand running around the
south route.

Just mem disease or siphon str and cast on everything you see spawn,
or ask teh groups there, and shoot an arrow or take a swing, and
you'll get the faction in no time.

Xilith (Master Powerfactioner)
